preconditions.precondition: RepositoryManager requests checksum status from DIMS System.

mainSequence.step: RepositoryManager requests checksum status from DIMS System.
DIMS System queries latest content file details from Digital Repository.
Digital Repository returns file details to DIMS System.
DIMS System retrieves stored checksums from Checksum Database.
Checksum Database provides checksum data to DIMS System.
DIMS System compares latest and stored checksums.

asteps.step: Checksum changed - DIMS System notifies RepositoryManager of checksum change.
Checksum unchanged - DIMS System confirms no changes to RepositoryManager.
